nodes.text: Pendago were a sentient species with multiple tentacled limbs. One Pendago was a member of the Razorclaw Gang on Serenno, and had several of its limbs cut off by Asajj Ventress, who was attempting to learn the location of the Crolute criminal Glute.
Pendago first appeared in the audiobook Dooku: Jedi Lost, written by Cavan Scott and published in 2019. The spelling of their name was given in the script of the audiobook.
